amendment.description: Amendment requires TransCanada to submit its oil spill response plan and any updates to the plan, to the Governors of each State in which the Keystone XL pipeline operates.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 113-88 to require TransCanada to submit its oil spill response plan, and any updates to the plan, to the Governors of each State in which the Keystone XL pipeline operates. TransCanada is required to develop such a plan under current law and regulations; only certain Federal agencies receive and review the plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Cohen.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
